Your preferred language will be applied: Your preferred language will be applied to all interface texts
Access thousands of games in one place: Access thousands of games in one place

valheim.title: Valheim
valheim.description: Fight for survival in the mythical world of Valheim, where legendary Viking warriors live after death. Explore dangerous forests and climb mountains to prove you are worthy of Valhalla.

halflife.title: Half-Life: Alyx
halflife.description: In this new chapter of Half-Life set in virtual reality, you are humanity's only hope against the Combine's increasing power.

traffic.title: Traffic Police
traffic.description: Serve as a traffic police officer, catch those who violate traffic rules, and maintain order in the city.

reddead.title: Red Dead Redemption
reddead.description: Struggle to survive as an outlaw in the last days of the Wild West. An epic adventure where concepts of revenge, honor, and loyalty are tested.

hogwarts.title: Hogwarts Legacy
hogwarts.description: Step into the wizarding world in Hogwarts Legacy. Create your own character and discover ancient secrets in your adventure at the school of wizardry.

Bingo.title: Bingo
Bingo.description: Bingo fun is just a click away! Mark off your lucky numbers and be the first to yell 'Bingo!' in all the excitement!
howToPlay: Each player receives a random Bingo card
The host draws numbers at random
Mark the number on your card if it's been called
Be the first to complete a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally and shout 'Bingo!' to win

Uno.title: Uno
Uno.description: Get ready for fast-paced fun with Uno! Match colors or numbers, play action cards, and be the first to get rid of all your cards!
howToPlay: Each player is dealt 7 cards at the start
Take turns matching the top card by color or number
Use action cards to skip, reverse, or draw cards
When you have one card left, shout 'UNO!'
The first player to play all their cards wins

Chess.title: Chess
Chess.description: Test your strategy and logic in the timeless game of Chess. Outsmart your opponent and checkmate the king to win the match!
howToPlay: Each player starts with 16 pieces: pawns, knights, bishops, rooks, a queen, and a king
Players take turns moving one piece per turn
Use strategy to protect your king and attack your opponent's pieces
Capture pieces by moving into their square
Win by putting the opponent's king in a position where it cannot escape: checkmate

HangMan.title: HangMan
HangMan.description: Guess the word before the stick figure is fully drawn! Use logic and vocabulary to uncover the hidden word letter by letter.
howToPlay: One player thinks of a word and marks blanks for each letter
The other player guesses letters one at a time
Correct guesses reveal the letter in the word
Incorrect guesses add parts to the hangman drawing
The guessing player wins by revealing the word before the hangman is fully drawn

Valorant.title: Valorant
Valorant.description: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities.

Cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk 2077
Cyberpunk.description: An open-world action-adventure RPG set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.
